name: Trader Joes
description:
Trader Joes was made for JamCraft7

You work at a traders outpost in a zombie apocalypse

Controls

Walk : WASD/Mouse Look

Run : Left Shift

Interact : E

Throw Item : Q

The Team

Renderbydavid - Code, Modeling, Animation

Mike Breidegam - Music, SFX

CreppyRebel - Itch Banner & Thumbnail
